tool_description:
Precisely target mobile audiences and increase ROI
Drawbridge technology enables targeting across devices to drive CPI, CPL, CPA, and customer lifetime value.  Drawbridge's technology bridges audiences across devices and enables two mobile targeting and optimization products.
name: Drawbridge
title: Drawbridge

api_list.name: Track Conversion
api_list.description: Server-to-server conversion tracking and post-conversion API for Advertisers  This API enables advertisers to send conversion and post-conversion signals via server-to-server integration.  You can find all parameter combinations in http://doc.drawbrid.ge/#65,66,76,79-

required_parameters.name: _dpid
required_parameters.description: Unique Platform Device id - for iOS apps, it is the 'udid' (unique device identifier) value, and for Android apps, it is the 'Android Id'. If these IDs are not available, see other alternatives _macsha1 and _opudid below.

required_parameters.name: _macaddr
required_parameters.description: Raw MAC address for iOS and Android

required_parameters.name: _aid
required_parameters.description: Appstore ApplicationId such as "284882215" for iPhone app OR "com.facebook.katana" for Android app

required_parameters.name: _ifa
required_parameters.description: Required for iOS6 for conversion tracking

required_parameters.name: _optout
required_parameters.description: Optout field to indicate user opt-out for behavior tracking, 1 for "don't track", 0 for "default"

optional_parameters.name: _macmd5
optional_parameters.description: MD5 hash of mac address for iOS and Andorid

optional_parameters.name: _macsha1
optional_parameters.description: SHA1 of device mac address - Mostly for iOS apps as 'udid' (see _dpid above) is being deprecated. If 'udid' is not available to be passed in the _dpid parameter, a SHA1 of mac address (if available) should be passed here. Otherwise see _opudid below.

optional_parameters.name: _odin1
optional_parameters.description: The ODIN1 value of the device. For more information on ODIN1 go here.

optional_parameters.name: _opudid
optional_parameters.description: Open UDID - Mostly for iOS apps as 'udid' (see _dpid above) is being deprecated. If this id is available, it can be passed here too. Refer to more details on Open UDID here

optional_parameters.name: _imei
optional_parameters.description: TelephonyID (Android only) - The IMEI / MEID of the Android device.

optional_parameters.name: _clip
optional_parameters.description: Client IP Address. In case of a mobile device, this is the IP closest to the device carrier IP or WiFi.

optional_parameters.name: _lbl
optional_parameters.description: A unique label describing the action. "CT" means conversions and “PC” means post-conversion. When the value is “PC” additional parameters have to be specified. For the complete list of parameters, refer to “post-conversion data” section below.

api_list.name: Ad Statistics
api_list.description: This API allows advertisers to retrieve impressions, clicks, conversions, spend and other metrics across all campaigns, for individual campaigns and ad sizes.

optional_parameters.name: campaign_id
optional_parameters.description: Campaign ID - the ID of the campaign for the report; if omitted, all campaigns are included

optional_parameters.name: ad_group_id
optional_parameters.description: Ad group ID - the ID of the ad group for the report; if omitted, all ad groups are included

optional_parameters.name: ad_id
optional_parameters.description: Ad ID - the ID of the ad for the report; if omitted, all ads are included

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Start date - inclusive start date for the report in the format yyyy-mm-dd

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: End date - inclusive end date for the report in the format yyyy-mm-dd

optional_parameters.name: time_zone
optional_parameters.description: Time zone - time zone for input and output dates; example: America/Los_Angeles

optional_parameters.name: pretty_print
optional_parameters.description: Pretty print - provide the JSON output in a human-readable format

optional_parameters.name: version
optional_parameters.description: API version - the API documented here is version 2; if omitted, defaults to version 1
